name: Dorian's Door Emporium
description:
Welcome to Dorian's Door Emporium. You are a door technician who has been called to rescue a locked employee.

With unoriginal gameplay, robotic human dialogue, and a lackluster ending; Dorian's Door Emporium is another game jam entry.

Controls:

Standards WASD and Mouse

E to Interact or grab

Esc or Q for main menu

CREDITS:

Door Sounds from OpengameArt, released under CC0.

OpenDyslexic Font, released under OFL.

Godot Engine 3.4 from Godot Contributors

Everything else by me (Music as well)
